New Records: Haris Rauf has picked his 100th T20I wicket in just his 69th T20I innings, the third-fastest in T20I history
Key Match Events: Pakistan won by 7 wickets (with 15 balls remaining)
Haris Rauf removed Nicholas Kirton, Shreyas Movva and Ravinderpaul Singh to further put Canada in trouble
Mohammad Amir struck the first blow for Pakistan, getting Navneet Dhaliwal and Pargat Singh
Shaheen Shah Afridi struck right away with a back-of-a-length ball that took Pargat Singh's outside edge and flew to first slip
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan cannot afford any more slip-ups
Pakistan need to find a way to not just win, but win big and stay alive in the competition
Canada find themselves in a situation where a win will make the Super Eight road a bright reality
Canada have the highest score of 137 which they produced against Ireland
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammad Rizwan can smile as Pakistan get the job done
Pakistan finally register a win with two-and-a-half overs to spare
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan have focused on getting the points, rather than worrying too much about NRR for now
Pakistan need to chase these runs in 19.1 overs to get into positive NRR
The ball is turning as well
Others: The Pakistan fans have been coming in for this all-important clash
Babar Azam has the coin and Pakistan will be bowling first
Saim Ayub comes in and Iftikhar Ahmed has been dropped
RizBar has been split and Ayub will be opening the batting
